project_descr: Improving the level of educational achievement in primary schools in deprived regions of Mauritius

outputs.output_descr:
The overall objective of this project is to support the Government of Mauritius in its efforts towards the alleviation of poverty and the achievement of the Millennium Development Goals. Education is the major component for poverty alleviation and development in Mauritius. 

As a result, the project focuses on the long term strategies developed by the Ministry of Education, Culture and Human Resources to fulfil its commitment to achieve MDGs and the EFA goals by 2015, and accelerating the educational reform through the implementation of the “National Strategic Plan for Education and Training
donor_name: UNITED NATIONS EDUCATIONAL, SCIENTIFIC & CULTURAL ORGANIZAITON
